statements: DELETE FROM call_records WHERE caller_id = 2002 AND receiver_id = 3003
DELETE FROM CallRecords WHERE caller_number='1234567890' AND recipient_number='0987654321';
DELETE FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE network_id=100 AND network_type='LTE';
DELETE FROM NetworkTraffic WHERE data_volume > 1000 AND protocol = 'TCP';
DELETE FROM FraudulentActivities WHERE detection_method = 'Machine Learning';
DELETE FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE record_id IN (SELECT record_id FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE protocol = 'HTTP') AND traffic_datetime < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM NetworkTrafficData WHERE data_amount > 500 AND traffic_date < '2022-01-01';
